entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@realDonaldTrump @funder
BREAKING: HHS whistleblower says US workers received coronavirus evacuees without proper precautions.Workers lacked proper training and protective gear.The whistleblower was then improperly reassigned after raising concerns.This is sickening.The Trump Admin is disgusting.
